Class NeuralNetwork

java.lang.Object
NeuralNetwork
public class NeuralNetwork extends Object
Represents a neural network

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

  • Constructor Details

    • NeuralNetwork

      public NeuralNetwork(ArrayList<InputNode> inputNodes, ArrayList<Neuron> outputNeurons, Matrix trainingSet, Matrix targetOutput)
      instantiates a neural network ready for training.
      Parameters:
      inputNodes - the input layer
      outputNeurons - the output layer
      trainingSet - the training set, each column should be a new set, and each row a different input
      targetOutput - the target output, each column should be the target output of a set, and each row a different output

    • NeuralNetwork

      public NeuralNetwork(ArrayList<InputNode> inputNodes, ArrayList<Neuron> outputNeurons)
      instantiates a neural network.
      Parameters:
      inputNodes - the input layer
      outputNeurons - the output layer

  • Method Details

    • layeredBuilder

      public static NeuralNetwork layeredBuilder(int numInputs, int numOutputs, Matrix trainingSet, Matrix targetOutput, ArrayList<Integer> layerSizes)
      builds a layered network automatically
      Parameters:
      numInputs - number of inputs
      numOutputs - number of outputs
      trainingSet - the training set
      targetOutput - the target output of the training set
      layerSizes - how many neurons each layer will have
      Returns:
      the built layered network

    • loadFromFile

      public static NeuralNetwork loadFromFile(String file) throws IOException
      loads a NeuralNetwork from a file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file path to load the network from
      Returns:
      the network read from the file
      Throws:
      IOException - when an IO error occurs

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile(String file) throws IOException
      saves/serializes a NeuralNetwork to a file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to save the network to
      Throws:
      IOException - when an IO error occurs

    • train

      public void train(Integer iterations, Double maxError, double learningRate)
      trains the neural network untill the error is below the specified one or untill the number of iterations are reached.
      Parameters:
      iterations - the number of times to perform backpropagation (can be null)
      maxError - the maximum error the network should have (can be null)
      learningRate - the learning rate

    • train

      public void train(int iterations, double learningRate)
      trains the neural network for a certain ammount of iterations.
      Parameters:
      iterations - the number of times to perform backpropagation
      learningRate - the learning rate

    • train

      public void train(double maxError, double learningRate)
      trains the neural network untill the error is below the specified one.
      Parameters:
      maxError - the maximum error the network should have
      learningRate - the learning rate

    • propagate

      public void propagate()
      performs the propagation of the network. if the output is cached, doesn't propagate.

    • forcePropagation

      public void forcePropagation()
      propagates no matter what.

    • ghostpropagate

      public void ghostpropagate()
      performs propagation without setting up backpropagation

    • evaluate

      public Matrix evaluate(Matrix input)
      calculates the output for a given input
      Parameters:
      input - the input
      Returns:
      the output

    • backpropagate

      public void backpropagate(double learningRate)
      performs a backwards pass (backpropagation) of the network
      Parameters:
      learningRate - the rate of learning

    • printOutputs

      public void printOutputs()
      prints the outputs with respect to each input.

    • output

      public Matrix output()
      Returns:
      a matrix with the outputs of the network, with each row in respect to an output and each columns in respect to each training input

    • ghostOutput

      public Matrix ghostOutput()
      Returns:
      a matrix with the outputs of the networ, with each row in respect to a ghost output, and each column in respect to each input

    • getError

      public double getError()
      Returns:
      the MSE (average of errors of all outputs)

    • getError

      public double getError(Matrix inputs, Matrix targetOutputs)
      gets the error for a specific input-output set
      Parameters:
      inputs - the inputs to check for error
      targetOutputs - the target output of the given inputs
      Returns:
      the MSE

    • getTestingError

      public double getTestingError()
      Returns:
      the error of the test sets

    • getAccuracy

      public double getAccuracy(boolean isTesting)
      how good the guesses are (ranges between 0 and 1) assumes the network is a binary classifier (has a single output)
      Parameters:
      isTesting - if it should calculate for the testing data
      Returns:
      the accuracy

    • getPrecision

      public double getPrecision(boolean isTesting)
      the "agreement" score (ranges between 0 and 1). assumes the network is a binary classifier (has a single output)
      Parameters:
      isTesting - if it should calculate for the testing data
      Returns:
      the precision

    • getRecall

      public double getRecall(boolean isTesting)
      how well the classifier identifies true positives (ranges between 0 and 1) assumes the network is a binary classifier (has a single output)
      Parameters:
      isTesting - if it should calculate for the testing data
      Returns:
      the recall

    • getKappa

      public double getKappa(boolean isTesting)
      score ranging from -1 to 1, where -1 is total disagreement, 0 is random guess, 1 is total agreement. assumes the network is a binary classifier (has a single output)
      Parameters:
      isTesting - if it should calculate for the testing data
      Returns:
      the kappa

    • isBinaryClassifier

      public boolean isBinaryClassifier()
      Returns:
      true if the network is a binary classifier (has one output)

    • hasTestingSet

      public boolean hasTestingSet()
      Returns:
      true if the network has a testing set

    • printWeights

      public void printWeights()
      prints the weights of each connection in the network.

      public String getWeightInfo()
      Returns:
      the weight info

      public void iterativePropagation()
      performs propagation with user input.

      public int iterationsDone()
      Returns:
      the number of iterations done through training

      public final void setTrainingData(Matrix trainingSet, Matrix targetOutput)
      sets the training data
      Parameters:
      trainingSet - the training data to use
      targetOutput - the target output

    • runKFolds

      public static void runKFolds(int folds, Matrix samples, Matrix targetOutputs, int maxIter, double learningRate, String neuralNetworkFile) throws IOException
      runs the k-folds cross validation.
      Parameters:
      folds - the number of folds (divisions)
      samples - all the data sets to train and test the network on. (each column is a different input, and each row is each part of one input)
      targetOutputs - the target output for the data sets
      maxIter - the number of max iterations before stopping each training
      learningRate - the learning rate to learn at
      neuralNetworkFile - the file path containing the network to test (not trained)
      Throws:
      IOException - if an IO error occurs
